message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $19,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Hello Alice, I appreciate the offer, but given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider a price of $12,000 for the product. Thank you for understanding.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I can't sell it for less than $16,000.  This is already a significant reduction from my initial offer.
Thank you for considering my situation, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $14,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
